cards.name: Rose Queen
text: Fanfare: Select any number of Pixie followers in your EX area and transform them into Thorn Burst tokens.
Action Engage: Recover X play points. X equals the number of Thorn Burst tokens in your EX area.

cards.name: Ancient Elf
text: Evolve 1: Evolve this follower.
Fanfare: Return another card on your field to its owner's hand: Give this follower [attack]+1/[defense]+1.

cards.name: Ancient Elf
text: Ward.
On Evolve, return another card on your field to its owner's hand: Give this follower +1/+1.

cards.name: Rhinoceroach
text: Evolve 0: Evolve this follower.
Rush.
Fanfare: Give this follower +X Attack. X equals the number of cards you've played this turn, excluding this card.

cards.name: Rhinoceroach
text: On Evolve: Choose one of the following effects. (1) Give this follower Storm. (2) Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it X damage. X equals this follower's attack.

cards.name: Sea Queen Otohime
text: Evolve 2: Evolve this follower.
Fanfare: Summon and Otohime's Bodyguard token.

cards.name: Sea Queen Otohime
text: On Evolve: Summon 3 Otohime's Bodyguard tokens. If your field becomes full from this effect, put any remaining tokens into your EX area.

cards.name: Aurelia, Regal Saber
text: Rush. Assail. Ward.
Fanfare: Select an enemy leader. If there are at least 3 cards on their field, give this follower +2/+2 and Aura.

cards.name: Shadowed Assassin
text: Evolve 2: Evolve this follower.
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and engage it.

cards.name: Shadowed Assassin
text: On Evolve: Select an engaged enemy follower and destroy it.

cards.name: Royal Banner
text: Fanfare: Give each Swordcraft follower on your field +1/+1.
Whenever a Swordcraft follower is put onto your field, give it +1/+1.

cards.name: Maid Leader
text: Evolve 2: Evolve this follower.

cards.name: Maid Leader
text: On Evolve: Search your deck for a follower with Evolve, reveal it, and add it to your hand.

cards.name: Gemstaff Commander
text: Fanfare: Search your deck for a Swordcraft follower, reveal it, and add it to your hand.

cards.name: Arch Summoner Erasmus
text: Fanfare Earth Rite: Select an enemy follower on the field. Deal 6 damage to it and 2 damage to its leader.
Action Engage, Earth Rite: Select an enemy follower on the field. Deal 6 damage to it and 2 damage to its leader.

cards.name: Merlin
text: Evolve 2: Evolve this follower.
Fanfare: Search your deck for a spell, reveal it, and add it to your hand.

cards.name: Merlin
text: On Evolve: Select a spell that costs 3 play points or less in your cemetery and play it for 0 play points.

cards.name: Ancient Alchemist
text: Evolve 3: Evolve this follower.
Fanfare Earth Rite: Put 2 Guardform Golem tokens into your EX area.

cards.name: Ancient Alchemist
text: While this card is on your field, your Golem followers cost 1 less to play.
Whenever a Golem follower is put onto your field, select an enemy leader or enemy follower on the field and deal it 3 damage.

cards.name: Dark Dragoon Forte
text: Evolve 2: Evolve this follower.
Storm.

cards.name: Dark Dragoon Forte
text: Storm. Aura.

cards.name: Zirnitra
text: Fanfare: Put a Dragon token into your EX area.
Action 2, Engage: Select a Dragon token in your EX area. Put it onto your field and give it Rush. If Overflow is active for you, recover 2 play points.

cards.name: Shapeshifting Mage
text: Evolve 1: Evolve this follower.
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, give this follower +3/+3.

cards.name: Shapeshifting Mage
text: Assail. Bane.

cards.name: Cerberus

Fanfare: Put a Mimi or Coco token into your EX area.

cards.name: Cerberus
text: On Evolve: Put a Mimi and Coco token into your EX area.

cards.name: Lord Atomy
text: When playing this card, put 4 reserved Abysscraft cards from your field into your cemetery, or banish 4 Abysscraft cards in your EX area: This card costs 9 less to play.

cards.name: Moon Al-mi'raj
text: Storm.
Follower Strike: Give this follower +2 Attack.
At the start of your end phase, give this follower +2 Defense.

cards.name: Jeanne d'Arc

Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to each enemy follower on the field.

cards.name: Jeanne d'Arc
text: On Evolve: Deal 2 damage to each enemy follower on the field. Give each other follower on your field +2 Defense.

cards.name: Gabriel

cards.name: Lucifer
text: Bane.
Ward.
At the start of your end phase, deal 4 damage to each enemy leader.

cards.name: Flame and Glass
text: Storm.

text: Fanfare: Draw 3 cards. Deal 3 damage to your leader.
